docs.title: About me

docs.text:
Introduction


Gashapon in shuffle or random mode.


Dependence


None


Usage


Create instance


var
 
gashapon
 
=
 
new
 
Gashapon
({

    
mode
:
 
shuffle
,
  
// 0|
shuffle
|1|
random

    
items
:
 
{

        
a
:
1
,
 
b
:
2
,
 
c
:
3
  
// itemName:count

    
},

    
reload
:
 
true
,
     
// true|false


});





Pick item


Pick a random item


gashapon
.
next
();
  
// return null if pick nothing





Try pick specific item


gashapon
.
next
(
a
);
  
// return null if pick nothing





Set item


Set item


gashapon
.
setItem
(
a
,
 
1
);


// gashapon.setItem(
a
, 1).setItem(
b
, 2).setItem(
c
, 3);





Remove item


Remove item


gashapon
.
removeItem
(
a
);


// gashapon.removeItem(
b
).gashapon.removeItem(
c
);





Remove all items


gashapon
.
removeAllItems
();
docs.title: Gashapon

docs.text: Gashapon in shuffle or random mode.
docs.title: Introduction
Create instance

docs.text: gashapon . next ();    // return null if pick nothing
docs.title: Pick a random item

docs.text: gashapon . next ( a );    // return null if pick nothing
docs.title: Try pick specific item

docs.text: gashapon . setItem ( a ,   1 );  // gashapon.setItem( a , 1).setItem( b , 2).setItem( c , 3);
docs.title: Set item

docs.text: gashapon . removeItem ( a );  // gashapon.removeItem( b ).gashapon.removeItem( c );
docs.title: Remove item
